suite.name: Test EmploymentStatus

kw.name: Open the Browser with URL
Create Webdriver
kw.msg: Creating an instance of the Chrome WebDriver.
kw.doc: Creates an instance of Selenium WebDriver.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.kw: Maximizes current browser window. ======= Creating an instance of the Chrome WebDriver. ${browser_name} Creates an instance of Selenium WebDriver. Opening url 'https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/web/index.php/auth/login' ${url} Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``. Maximizes current browser window. >>>>>>> Stashed changes 5 Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium. <<<<<<< Updated upstream Typing text 'Admin' into text field 'xpath=//input[@placeholder='Username']'. ${us_name} ${username} Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``. Typing password into text field 'name=password'. Temporally setting log level to: NONE ${pa_word} ${password} Types the given password into the text field identified by ``locator``. Clicking button 'css:.orangehrm-login-button'. ${button} Clicks the button identified by ``locator``. Admin admin123 Clicking element 'css:a[href="/web/index.php/admin/viewAdminModule"]'. ${admin} Click the element identified by ``locator``. ${job} Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible. Clicking element 'xpath=(//i[@class='oxd-icon bi-chevron-down']/ancestor::span)[2]'. ${job} Click the element identified by ``locator``. ${employment} Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible. Clicking element 'xpath=(//ul[@class='oxd-dropdown-menu']//li)[3]'. ${employment} Click the element identified by ``locator``. ${add_button} Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible. Clicking button 'xpath=//button[@type="button"][@class="oxd-button oxd-button--medium oxd-button--secondary"]'. ${add_button} Clicks the button identified by ``locator``. Typing text 'Part Timess' into text field 'xpath=//div[@class='oxd-input-group__label-wrapper']/following-sibling::div//input'. ${employ_textbox} ${employ_text} Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``. ${Employment_Status} ${save_button} Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled. Clicking button 'xpath=(//p[@class='oxd-text oxd-text--p orangehrm-form-hint']//following-sibling::button)[2]'. ${save_button} Clicks the button identified by ``locator``. Verifying element 'xpath=(//div[@class='oxd-toast-start']//p)[2]' contains exact text 'Successfully Saved'. The text of element 'xpath=(//div[@class='oxd-toast-start']//p)[2]' should have been 'Successfully Saved' but it was ''. ${assert} Successfully Saved Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``. The text of element 'xpath=(//div[@class='oxd-toast-start']//p)[2]' should have been 'Successfully Saved' but it was ''. The text of element 'xpath=(//div[@class='oxd-toast-start']//p)[2]' should have been 'Successfully Saved' but it was ''. ======= Typing text 'Admin' into text field 'xpath://input[@name='username']'. xpath://input[@name='username'] ${Username} Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``. Typing password into text field 'xpath://input[@type='password']'. Temporally setting log level to: NONE xpath://input[@type='password'] ${Password} Types the given password into the text field identified by ``locator``. Clicking button 'xpath://button[@type='submit']'. xpath://button[@type='submit'] Clicks the button identified by ``locator``. Admin admin123 ${clock} Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible. Clicking button 'css:button[class='oxd-icon-button oxd-icon-button--solid-main orangehrm-attendance-card-action'][type='button']'. ${clock} Clicks the button identified by ``locator``. Current page contains element 'xpath=//div[@class='orangehrm-card-container']//h6'. ${punch_out} Punch Out Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page. >>>>>>> Stashed changes Employment_Status=Part Timess The text of element 'xpath=(//div[@class='oxd-toast-start']//p)[2]' should have been 'Successfully Saved' but it was ''.

kw.name: Close the Browser
kw.kw: Closes the current browser. <<<<<<< Updated upstream

kw.status: The text of element 'xpath=(//div[@class='oxd-toast-start']//p)[2]' should have been 'Successfully Saved' but it was ''.
